ComicInfo.Summary:
Upsetting the system has dire consequences in the afterlife, as Jude and Hemingway soon find out. Between underhanded deals upstairs and the threat of seraphim and wraiths down on the ground, the odds are quickly stacking against them. Will the return of a familiar face (and handkerchief) mean the arrival of an ally, or yet another danger? From the writer of THE BUNKER and breakout artist Gabo.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Nick Pitarra | 1 | B | Cover B | Gabriel "Gabo" Bautista | 2 |
